title: DAIDO MORIYAMA - Sans Serif - FONT ID
content:
Looking for an ID on this simple sans serif.

Many thanks in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321213722im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TIG_book_121205_-0068_6076.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [TIG\_book\_121205\_-0068.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321213722/http:/typophile.com/files/TIG_book_121205_-0068.jpg) | 108.3 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Appears to be garden variety Helvetica, but hard to be sure with such a small sample and so few characters.

Could also be Neue Haas Grotesk:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-haas-grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150321213722/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-haas-grotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-haas-grotesk/")
